definition: the geographical area under the jurisdiction of a sovereign state, make soiled, filthy, or dirty
details:
noun
- the geographical area under the jurisdiction of a sovereign state
= example: the geographical area under the jurisdiction of a sovereign state
= synonyms: territory
- material in the top layer of the surface of the earth in which plants can grow (especially with reference to its quality or use)
= synonyms: land
- the state of being covered with unclean things
= synonyms: stain
- the part of the earth's surface consisting of humus and disintegrated rock
= synonyms: dirt
verb
- make soiled, filthy, or dirty
= example: make soiled, filthy, or dirty
= synonyms: dirty
